tylenol.description: Tylenol (acetaminophen) is a pain reliever and a fever reducer.
side_effects: Serious allergic reactions to this drug are rare.

Robitussin.description: Robitussin helps clear mucus or phlegm from the chest when you have congestion from a cold or flu.
side_effects: Less common or rare side effects include diarrhea, dizziness, headache, hives, nausea or vomiting, skin rash, or stomach pain.

Tretinoin.description: Tretinoin is used to treat pimples.
side_effects: Common side affects include burning feeling or stingin of skin, unexpected lightening of skin of treated area, peeling of skin, redness of skin, and unusual dryness of skin
Rare side effects include darkening of treated skin

Melatonin.description: Melatonin is the natural hormone your body secretes that helps to maintain your wake-sleep cycle.
side_effects: Common side effects include drowsiness, stomach pain, headache, and dizziness.

Neosporin.description: Neosporin is an antibiotic that kills bacteria on your skin.
side_effects: Common side effects include itching, skin rash, redness, and swelling.
